# The `ScalarEnumerationTraits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class should be specialized by any integral type that converts to/from a YAML scalar where there is a one-to-one mapping between in-memory values and a string in YAML. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename T, typename Enable = void&gt;
struct llvm::yaml::ScalarEnumerationTraits&lt;T, Enable&gt;</CodeBlock>

<IncludesList>

  isLocal="true" />
</IncludesList>

## Description {#details}

This class should be specialized by any integral type that converts to/from a YAML scalar where there is a one-to-one mapping between in-memory values and a string in YAML.

For example: 

<CodeBlock>
struct ScalarEnumerationTraits&lt;Colors&gt; &#123;
    static void enumeration(IO &amp;io, Colors &amp;value) &#123;
      io.enumCase(value, &quot;red&quot;,   cRed);
      io.enumCase(value, &quot;blue&quot;,  cBlue);
      io.enumCase(value, &quot;green&quot;, cGreen);
    &#125;
  &#125;; 
</CodeBlock>

Definition at line 107 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/yamltraits-h">YAMLTraits.h</a>.

</DoxygenPage>
